articles.description: Herman Mostert highlights FIVE talking points following New Zealand's 19-17 win over South Africa in Townsville.
articles.content:
Jordie Barrett steals the show
Fullback Jordie Barrett turned into New Zealand's unlikely hero with a flawless display of goalkicking.

articles.title: An Afghan restaurant's sales dropped 80% after the Taliban takeover. Owner says there is no hope for entrepreneurs like him. - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: The owner of Laziz Mahal Restaurant in Kabul, Afghanistan, told Insider his business has been badly affected since the Taliban took over last month.
articles.content:
• A Kabul restaurant owner says the Taliban takeover has left him feeling hopeless.
